item.description:
Anyone up for 9 holes Saturday afternoon? I'm thinking about Pine Meadows in Lexington - 2:00pm.

http://www.pinemeadowsgolfclub.com

Weekend rate is $23.00 unless you're a Lexington Resident, then you get to play for $20. A cart will run you $16.00 - for a complete listing of rates:

http://www.pinemeadowsgolfclub.com/fees.html

I've played Pine Meadows many times before, so I'm open to suggestions if anyone wants to play elsewhere and try something new. Or if the date is good, but you need to move the time around, just drop me a line!

Updated 7/5 - The actual tee times will be 2:19 and 2:28, held under my name. Meet outside the entrance to the clubhouse which is adjacent to the parking lot. Suggest arriving 10-15 minutes early so we can all get out on time. Will send contact information prior to Saturday!
item.how_to_find_us: Will send details closer to the date.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Pine Meadows - Lexington, MA
